languages.text: {n}Паскаль... Нет, Амарнат с любопытством смотрит на вас.{/n} "Опыт нашего товарищества многому научил данную единицу. Испытания и битвы, пройденные совместно, произвели в нас доверие и искренность, взаимопонимание. Амарнат проведет свою паству через пламя и перекует секту в церковь".

{n}Pasqal... no, Amarnat looks at you curiously.{/n} "The experience of our comradeship has taught this unit much. The trials and battles we have gone through have produced trust, sincerity, mutual understanding. Amarnat will lead his flock through the flames and forge the sect into a religion."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль... Нет, Амарнат с любопытством смотрит на вас.{/n} "Опыт нашего товарищества многому научил данную единицу. Испытания и битвы, пройденные совместно, произвели в нас доверие и искренность, взаимопонимание. Амарнат проведет свою паству через пламя и перекует секту в церковь".

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡……不，阿玛纳特好奇地看着你。{/n}“我们之间的战友关系，让本单位学会了很多事情。我们共同经历了考验与斗争，由此诞生了信任、真诚与相互理解。阿玛纳特将带领他的信徒穿过火焰，将我们的队伍锻造成真理的教派。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal... no, Amarnat looks at you curiously.{/n} "The experience of our comradeship has taught this unit much. The trials and battles we have gone through have produced trust, sincerity, mutual understanding. Amarnat will lead his flock through the flames and forge the sect into a religion."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡……不，阿玛纳特好奇地看着你。{/n}“我们之间的战友关系，让本单位学会了很多事情。我们共同经历了考验与斗争，由此诞生了信任、真诚与相互理解。阿玛纳特将带领他的信徒穿过火焰，将我们的教派锻造成一座真理教堂。”

languages.text: {n}Pasqal... no, Amarnat te mira con curiosidad.{/n} «La experiencia de nuestra camaradería ha enseñado mucho a esta unidad. Las pruebas y batallas que hemos superado han generado confianza, sinceridad y entendimiento mutuo. Amarnat conducirá a su rebaño por las llamas y convertirá la secta en una religión».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal... no, Amarnat looks at you curiously.{/n} "The experience of our comradeship has taught this unit much. The trials and battles we have gone through have produced trust, sincerity, mutual understanding. Amarnat will lead his flock through the flames and forge the sect into a religion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal... no, Amarnat te mira con curiosidad.{/n} «La experiencia de nuestra camaradería ha enseñado mucho a esta unidad. Las pruebas y batallas que hemos superado han generado confianza, sinceridad y entendimiento mutuo. Amarnat conducirá a su rebaño por las llamas y forjará la secta en una iglesia».

languages.text: {n}パスカル…いや、アマルナトが不思議そうにあなたを見ている。{/n}「仲間としての経験を通じて、このユニットに多くのことを教えてくれました。自分たちが経験した試練と戦いは、信頼、誠意、相互理解を生み出したのです。アマルナトは群れを率いて炎の中を進み、自らの一派を宗教へと発展させましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal... no, Amarnat looks at you curiously.{/n} "The experience of our comradeship has taught this unit much. The trials and battles we have gone through have produced trust, sincerity, mutual understanding. Amarnat will lead his flock through the flames and forge the sect into a religion."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカル…いや、アマルナトが不思議そうにあなたを見ている。{/n}「仲間としての経験を通じて、このユニットに多くのことを教えてくれました。自分たちが経験した試練と戦いは、信頼、誠意、相互理解を生み出したのです。アマルナトは群れを率いて炎の中を進み、自らの一派を宗教へと発展させましょう」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ... nein, Amarnat sieht dich mit einem merkwürdigen Blick an.{/n} "Die Erfahrung unserer Kameradschaft hat diese Einheit viel gelehrt. Die Prüfungen und Kämpfe, die wir durchgemacht haben, haben Vertrauen, Aufrichtigkeit, gegenseitiges Verständnis produziert. Amarnat wird seine Gemeinde durch die Flammen führen und die Sekte zu einer Religion schmieden."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal... no, Amarnat looks at you curiously.{/n} "The experience of our comradeship has taught this unit much. The trials and battles we have gone through have produced trust, sincerity, mutual understanding. Amarnat will lead his flock through the flames and forge the sect into a religion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal ... nein, Amarnat sieht dich mit einem merkwürdigen Blick an.{/n} "Die Erfahrung unserer Kameradschaft hat diese Einheit viel gelehrt. Die Prüfungen und Kämpfe, die wir durchgemacht haben, haben Vertrauen, Aufrichtigkeit, gegenseitiges Verständnis produziert. Amarnat wird seine Gemeinde durch die Flammen führen und die Sekte zu einer Kirche schmieden."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal... ou plutôt Amarnat vous regarde d'un air mystérieux.{/n} « L'expérience de notre camaraderie a appris beaucoup de choses à cette unité. Les épreuves et combats que nous avons traversés ont fait naître entre nous un sentiment de confiance, de sincérité et de compréhension mutuelle. Amarnat doit guider son troupeau à travers les flammes et transformer la secte en religion à part entière. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal... no, Amarnat looks at you curiously.{/n} "The experience of our comradeship has taught this unit much. The trials and battles we have gone through have produced trust, sincerity, mutual understanding. Amarnat will lead his flock through the flames and forge the sect into a religion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal... ou plutôt Amarnat vous regarde d'un air mystérieux.{/n} « L'expérience de notre camaraderie a appris beaucoup de choses à cette unité. Les épreuves et combats que nous avons traversés ont fait naître entre nous un sentiment de confiance, de sincérité et de compréhension mutuelle. Amarnat doit guider son troupeau à travers les flammes et transformer la secte en église officielle. »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, daha doğrusu Amarnat sana merakla bakıyor.{/n} "Yoldaşlığımızın sağladığı deneyim, bu birime birçok şey öğretti. Başımızdan geçen badireler ve muharebeler; güven, samimiyet ve karşılıklı anlayış meydana getirdi. Amarnat, takipçilerini ateşlerle sınayacak ve bu mezhebi bir dine dönüştürecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal... no, Amarnat looks at you curiously.{/n} "The experience of our comradeship has taught this unit much. The trials and battles we have gone through have produced trust, sincerity, mutual understanding. Amarnat will lead his flock through the flames and forge the sect into a religion."
